scripts.ncu: ncu -u && lerna exec ncu -- -u && rm -fR yarn.lock node_modules && yarn install && yarn bootstrap
scripts.build: lerna clean -y && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build --stream && yarn test
scripts.release: yarn release:check && yarn build && lerna publish ${VERSION:-patch} --registry $NPM_REGISTRY
scripts.release:check: git diff --exit-code && node -e 'if(process.env.NPM_REGISTRY) { process.exit(0) } else { console.log("NPM_REGISTRY is not set!"); process.exit(-1); }'
